data.title: President Vladimir Putin and Dutch Prime Minister Jan Peter Balkenende met with members of the Russian and Dutch business communities • President of Russia
data.text:
Russia is interested in building up cooperation in the energy and energy resources export sectors and also in the exchange of energy-efficient and energy conservation technology, Mr Putin said.

The President said that Dutch investment in Russia would help strengthen the Russian economy and develop joint production. Mr Putin also stressed the important of the two countries’ work together on the North European Gas Pipeline project.

In particular, the Campina CEO, the President of Essent, the General Director of GasTerra, the head of N.V. Nederlandse Gasunie and the General Director of the Company Royal Philips Electronics participated in the meeting from the Dutch side.
